title: RP from Missions
body:
i think that most of the players has not so much money to invest for game.so there should be missions from which we will get rp without money...
Please try to think about the matter.

replies.body: RP is the only way Riot makes money, they're not going to change that, its a F2P game, therefore the only money they get in is from RP Sales, why would they give out their only income for free?
